hackathon-requirements: Submit a link to a github repository with all necessary files for your project.
hackathon-rules:
You must have created all material starting at 9am on 2/12/17 and must submit all material by 6pm.
You must adhere to the theme, "adventure."

hackathon-prizes.prize-content: Each person wins phone camera lenses, a Starbucks gift card, and a mini-drone!
Each person wins phone camera lenses, a Starbucks gift card, and a phone magnifier!
Each person wins phone camera lenses, a Starbucks gift card, and a Google Cardboard headset!
Each person wins phone camera lenses, a Starbucks gift card, and a book on coding!

hackathon-location-google-maps: https://maps.google.com/?q=115 W 91st St, New York, NY 10024, USA

hackathon-judging-criteria.judging-criterion: How creative was the project?  Was the idea original? If not, did they address their competition?
Was the idea executed well? Is the user interface friendly?

How much does this project adhere to the theme, “adventure”?  If the connection is not clear, did they explain it? The teams have the freedom to interpret “adventure” however they see fit, as long as the interpretation is carefully explained.

hackathon-location-address: 115 W 91st St, New York, NY 10024, USA
hackathon-description-header: Trinity School's fourth annual hackathon for grades 5-12
